- St Kilda: 11.12, 15.12 → nope.
- Geelong: 15.12, 17.12 → closest is 17.12 but not 17.5.

Next, checking if there was an away team with 17.5 on Sunday, 30 January. Only Row 0 matches that date and crowd size, but the home team is Adelaide, not the away team (Melbourne). So even though the crowd and date are correct, the claim incorrectly attributes the score to the away team.
